seo.title: Try the YakShaver MCP Beta!
seo.description: Try the YakShaver MCP Beta! Download, install, and start shaving Yaks today.

tryItNowCards.title: 1. Download
tryItNowCards.description:
Download the YakShaver Beta below
- Windows - install the .exe
- Mac (darwin) - install the .zip

tryItNowCards.title: 2. Install
tryItNowCards.description:
Once the download is complete, run the installer to install YakShaver.
 (You may need to mark the app as "safe")

tryItNowCards.title: 3. Shave
tryItNowCards.description: Once installed, you can start shaving Yaks! For a detailed rundown, watch the video below.
